The Other Side of Al
About

Yo, I'm Albert Einstein

When not trying to figure out the physical laws of of nature, you can find me playing my guitar at several venues on the Sunset Strip in San Francisco. I host a Friday night jam session at the famous Rainbow club on the strip where you'll find me playing with guitarists like Eric Clapton, Jimmy Page, Larry Carlton and others. So please come and join me and my friends for an evening of music.
